message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. It's a great value, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can you meet me there?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can do $8250. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Can you consider $7500?
I understand you're still a bit higher, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I can do $8000, but that's as low as I can go. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Can you consider $7900?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8200, but that's as high as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Can you consider $8100?
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I think $8200 is a fair price. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're not willing to go any higher, but I'm still not comfortable with $8200. I'm willing to meet you at $8000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
